description: This file defines the NoteEditorScreen widget for editing or creating notes in a Flutter application. It manages user input for note title and content, interacts with a NotesProvider for persistence, and handles navigation upon save.

classes.name: NoteEditorResult
classes.description: A simple data class that encapsulates the result of editing a note, primarily its saved note ID.

classes.name: NoteEditorScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides a UI to create or edit a note, with save and validation logic.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the text controllers with existing note data if available.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the text controllers to free resources.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Handles saving the note by interacting with the NotesProvider, manages saving state, and sets flags for navigation.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the note editor UI, handling navigation after save.
